name: Thief (in a hurry)
description:
THIEF (in a hurry)

An infiltration game, where you can't hide nor rest, built for GMTK Game Jam.

Controls: WASD / ZQSD

NOTE: There is a known bug that may speed up your game (x2) if you fall between 2 hole tiles. Refresh the page if that happens.

Created using Typescript and HTML5.

Source code available on https://github.com/Maniae/thief-in-a-hurry

Tools: VSCode, Piskel
